idea-plugin.name: VimMulticursor
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin brings multiple cursors and selections to IdeaVim.
Features: - Create multiple cursors with 'mc' command prefix - Create multiple selections with 'ms' command prefix - Supports text objects (word, brackets, quotes) - Search-based selection with regex patterns - Character-based navigation (f, F, t, T) - Word navigation (w, W, b, B, e, E) - Intelligent bracket/quote matching
See full documentation and examples at: https://github.com/dankinsoid/VimMulticursor
